key_messages:
Key Messages:
Two studies from France and the USA found local population increases or reduced predationfollowing the translocation of predators away from an area.Â  A study in Saudi Arabia found that predation was no lower when predators were translocated from the bird release site.
background_information:
Background information and definitions:
If suitable habitats exist for predators away from sensitive bird populations then translocating predators may represent a solution to high levels of predation.
